content: these simple knit in the round fingerless mitts are intended to celebrate the beauty of the yarn they can be made in any length from wrist to elbow they are identical and interchangeable so no need to worry about mirroring the thumbs a quick knit in worsted weight yarn they would be a good first mitt for a new knitter in addition to the full pattern with illustrations there is a bare-bones version suitable for printing out and a page describing how to modify the longer gloves to fit less slender arms links to download are below bare-bones pattern 1 customizing for fuller arms 2 1 http //www computerlizards com/miscellany/2011/ravelry/amil%20fingerless%20mitts-barebones pdf 2 http //www computerlizards com/miscellany/2011/ravelry/customizingforfullerarms pdf
